CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Coal?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Coal is arc {Nuclear}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Solar?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Solar is arc {Hydropower}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Natural Gas} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Solar to Coal in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Nuclear to Solar in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hydropower to Natural Gas in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Solar in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Natural Gas and Solar is {241}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Solar and Nuclear in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Solar and Nuclear is {157}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Solar?
SC.A: The total flow output from Solar is {609}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Solar?
SC.A: The total flow input by Solar is {545}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 185? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {241} from {Solar} to {Natural Gas}, a flow of {208} from {Natural Gas} to {Solar}, a flow of {191} from {Solar} to {Coal}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 76? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {71} from {Hydropower} to {Natural Gas}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 140 and 167? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {157} from {Nuclear} to {Solar}, a flow of {149} from {Hydropower} to {Nuclear}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Coal to Natural Gas or from Solar to Coal?
NC.A: The flow from {Solar} to {Coal} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Nuclear to Hydropower, from Natural Gas to Coal, or from Solar to Nuclear?
NC.A: The flow from {Solar} to {Nuclear} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Solar}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Natural Gas} and {Solar}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Nuclear, Arc Solar, Arc Natural Gas, Arc Coal, Arc Hydropower}.
